nodes.text: Plague Group was the name given to the members of Wraith Squadron responsible for stealing and releasing a sample of Bunkurd Sewer Disorder during the Mission to Storinal.

For the theft of the disease, the group consisted of Doctor Ton Phanan, Kell Tainer, Tyria Sarkin and Eurrsk Thri'ag. Wes Janson joined the group to help release the disease aboard the Hawkbat's Perch and Hawkbat's Vigil.
